channel.title: The Security Guards and Scientests
channel.description: This may be stupid, but I was wondering if you could make the SGs and the Scientests die less... easily, or be more smart as to avoid the onslaught of bees flying at them. Because that's always bothering me in Half Life, I get a SG to join me, we go off, and he just stands there and tries to shoot a zombie as it beats him to death in less than five seconds. :meh:

item.title: The Security Guards and Scientests
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
any HECU appeared interrogating any scientist in hl. So I doubt they will here. They are just there to kill and some want to interrogate them before killing them to know what the fuck happened and who the hell is freeman.

Read full topic

item.title: The Security Guards and Scientests
item.dc:creator: popsUlfr
item.description:
Preda:

What about interaction?

Are the scientists and guards going to have random conversations like in HL1? I remember there was a cut event from the game when one of the guards was blaming a scientist for the disaster and was getting ready to beat the s*** out of him. That struck me as very “Mist”-like (which is itself one of Valve’s inspirations for HL). Will we see anything like that? Or maybe the soldiers interrogating the scientists?

This might be interesting. And this wiki article about AM too (Script section at the bottom).
There was also another post by JamesKane (I think?) stating that their animators/faceposers are real perfectionists and have gone great lengths to ensure believable character interactions. No, there won’t be any interrogation scenes judging from what I’ve read.

Read full topic

item.title: The Security Guards and Scientests

item.description:
^ I don’t think so. After all they only know 3 things:

-Shoot

-Die

-And own beers to you.

item.title: The Security Guards and Scientests
item.dc:creator: DemonicPumpkin89
item.description:
Raminator:

Nobody said that. They don’t heal each other and they don’t heal security guards.

Is there no way for you guys to set it up so they prioritize “I DON’T WANT TO DIE!” so that they will only heal others outside of combat. They don’t have to be field medics, but it would be a great help to revitalize friendly combatants before the next fire fight. Oh yeah, I just thought of something: If the scientists won’t heal anyone but you, then can the npcs (Security Guards preferably) pick up health packs like the citizens? I know the Devs are always stressing how they are not like citizens, but can they at least do that?

Read full topic

item.title: The Security Guards and Scientests
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
Fatalfox:

Will the Scientist in Black Mesa be able to defend themselves even remotely?
Because i was just wondering when i saw this concept art from another BM page

https://www.moddb.com/mods/operation-black-mesa

Seeing one Scientist in the picture begun to defend herself by taking a guards vest and pistol. That would make the game really fun and realistic.

1- That is NOT black mesa. It’s opperation black mesa by another mod team and it’s Oppossing force in source, not hl1.

2-Read the wiki a little bit boy, the scientist will never NEVER use a weapon or defend themselves.

3-I don’t see why it would make it fun, I mean, yeah, pretty realistic and all that crap but fun? if you shoot him by accident he will go on rage and shoot you into your eyes!

Read full topic

item.title: The Security Guards and Scientests
item.dc:creator: rorriMAesU
item.description:
No, and thats not another BM page, thats a completely different mod all together.

Read full topic

item.title: The Security Guards and Scientests
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Raminator:

There was a time where they’d literally force themselves inside you in order to heal you. :fffuuu:

“Get out of my face!”
“I’ll get inside your face!”

So, the scientists won’t heal you any more? That’s a shame because sometimes I relied on them to heal me partially if there were no health stations present. Yes, I’m a sucky player sometimes.

Read full topic

item.title: The Security Guards and Scientests

item.description:
Ah damn, that’s a shame. I wish they kept that, it’d be more like the HL2 rebel squad.

item.title: The Security Guards and Scientests
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
DemonicPumpkin89:

I think it would be cool if the Security Guards asked the Scientist for some medical attention. Like the HECU Marines will, except in their on Barneyish way. I mean hell, if the scientist aren’t going to use guns, they should be useful for something, right?

For a time they had the scientists healing security guards, but it was removed due to scientists commonly getting in the players way to heal your other companions.

Read full topic
